reference_documents: GI000198 > 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法_20231228 p.1
query: How to use the BOC cheque deposit machine to pay premium for my general insurance policy?

runs.query: How to use the BOC cheque deposit machine to pay premium for my general insurance policy?

results.content_en:
Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited Payment Instructions 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法
To protect your interest, you are recommended to make the premium payment directly to us by using the following payment instructions. Prudential may change the premium payment
arrangement available anytime without prior notice. For enquiry, please contact your Financial Consultant or General Insurance Customer Service Hotline at (852) 3656 8362 or visit our
corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk.
為保障 閣下的利益,我們建議 閣下使用下列辦法直接繳付保費。保誠可能隨時更改可提供保費繳款安排而毋須事先通知。如有任何查詢,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或致電一
般保險客戶服務熱線(852) 3656 8362,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
Autopay by Credit Card or Bank Account 以信用卡或銀行户口自動轉賬
Should you need to set up autopay or change autopay account, please contact your Financial
Consultant or visit our corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk (Customer Support &
Self Service > Download Centre > Product Brochures eForm - General Insurance > General
Insurance Administration Forms) for downloading PRUchoice Series Payment Details
Amendment Form. Only applicable to PRUchoice "Personal Accident" / "Personal Accident
Plus" / "Medical" / "MediExtra".
Internet Banking 網上銀行 *
Your premium may be settled through internet banking bill payment services offered by
banks. Please contact your bank / Financial Consultant or visit our corporate website at
www.prudential.com.hk for further details.
FPS (if applicable) 使用「轉數快」繳款(如適用)
Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.
c. Scan the FPS QR code printed on the bill.
d. Check and ensure that the payment details including merchant name, bill number and
payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.
如需設立自動轉賬或更改自動轉賬戶口以繳付保費,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
於我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk(客戶及自助服務>下載中心 >產品小
冊子及表格–一般保險>一般保險行政表格)下載保誠精選系列一更改付款資料
申請表。只適用於保誠精選「安健寶」/「倍安寶」/「醫療寶」/「健康寶」。
閣下可選擇由銀行提供的「網上繳費服務」繳費。詳情請聯絡 閣下的銀行 /理
財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。
c. 掃描帳單上的「轉數快」二維碼繳款
d. 在確認付款前請小心核對繳交款項的資料,包括商户名稱、收款帳號和繳付
金。
PPS (Require a New Bill Registration by "Billing Number")繳費靈*(必須以「繳費編號」登記賬單)
PPS By Internet
Please visit www.ppshk.com
繳費靈網上服務
請瀏覽 www.ppshk.com
PPS By Phone
Please dial 18031 (English) or 18033 (Cantonese)
繳費靈電話服務
請致電 18031 (英語)或18033(粤語)
Our Merchant Code
6555
商戶編號
6555
Bill Type
01 (General Insurance)
02 (Group Medical)
賬單類別
01(一般保險)
02(團體醫療)
Bill Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy
Number is 9)
賬單號碼
請輸入 12 位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
ATM (JETCO) 銀通櫃員機*
Our Merchant Code
9228
Bill Type
11 (General Insurance Premium)
12 (Employee Benefit Premium)
Bill / Account Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy
Number is 9)
Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
Cash in 7-Eleven (if applicable) 到 7-11 便利店以現金支付(如適用)
You can make your payment by presenting Debit Note at any 7-Eleven Conveniences stores in
Hong Kong. Please present the QR code printed on the Debit Note for payment in cash. Please
retain the receipt for payment record.
Cheque Payment by Mail 郵寄支票 *
Please settle the premium and return this Debit Note with a cheque to us at: 28/F, One Island
East, 18 Westlands Road, Quarry Bay, Hong Kong.
Remarks: (1) Only accept HKD crossed cheque made payable to "Prudential General
Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write down the name of the Insured and the Policy
Number on the back of the cheque. (2) Only accept HKD cheque, cashier order or bank draft
which issued by Hong Kong banks. (3) Post-dated cheque is not accepted. (4) Please do not
send cash.
商戶編號
賬單類別
賬戶/客戶號碼
9228
11 (一般保險保費)
12(僱員福利保費)
請輸入12位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
閣下可攜同付款通知書,前往香港任何一間 7-Eleven 便利店,出示付款通知書上
的QR 碼以現金繳付保費。請保留收據作付款紀錄。
請繳付保費連同付款通知書及支票一併以郵遞方式寄往本公司,地址:香港鯽魚
涌華蘭路18 號港島東中心28樓。
注意事項:(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票
背面寫上保單投保人及保單號碼。(2)只接受本港銀行發出之港元支票、銀行本
票或匯票。(3)期票恕不獲接受。(4)請勿投寄現金。
Bank of China (BOC) Cheque Deposit Machine 中國銀行(香港)有限公司(「中銀香港」)「存支票機」*
You may make your payment by depositing crossed cheques in HKD issued by Hong Kong
banks to the BOC Cheque Deposit Machine. Please be reminded (1) Only accept crossed
cheque made payable to "Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write
down the name of the Insured, the Policy Number and contact number on the back of the
cheque. (2) Pay one item per policy with one cheque only. (3) Key in your 12-digit Billing
Number (The first digit of Policy Number is 9) at the Cheque Deposit Machine. (4) If the
cheque payment is not accurate, complete or followed as set out by our company, you may
potentially suffer from loss due to delayed or overdue payment.
閣下可於中銀香港「存支票機」存入由本港銀行發出之港元劃線支票。請注意:
(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票背面寫上保
單投保人姓名、保單編號及聯絡電話。(2)每張支票只限繳付一張保單的單項費
用。(3)請於「存支票機」輸入12位數字之繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)。(4)如
有關支票繳款未符合本公司規定,閣下可能因未能如期繳交費用而蒙受損失。
Note:
* Please allow 3 working days for payment processing. 請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。

cheque made payable to "Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write
down the name of the Insured, the Policy Number and contact number on the back of the

cheque payment is not accurate, complete or followed as set out by our company, you may
potentially suffer from loss due to delayed or overdue payment.

I understand and consent that after deducting all other relevant redemption charges as listed above (if applicable), the surrender value / policy account value
will be reduced by the percentage of MVA based on the receipt date of this fully completed form with the required supporting documents by Prudential. I further
understand that the MVA, when applied, reduces the surrender value / policy account value to reflect the market value movement
of the underlying assets of the captioned policy. 本人明白及同意在扣除上表所列之提取費用後(如適用),退保價值/保單戶口價值須減去有關

1. All payments would be issued by cheque and in the name of the policyowner. For policy with collateral assignment, please state the payee of the cheque.

below. 除在以下註明遞交方式,支票將會以掛號形式郵寄到保單持有人在保誠記錄上的通訊地址。

PAIPPW0401Part 1 第一部分 Policy Surrender / Withdrawal of Cash Value 退保/提取現金價值指示
I understand and consent that after deducting all other relevant redemption charges as listed above (if applicable), the surrender value / policy account value
will be reduced by the percentage of MVA based on the receipt date of this fully completed form with the required supporting documents by Prudential. I further
understand that the MVA, when applied, reduces the surrender value / policy account value to reflect the market value movement
of the underlying assets of the captioned policy. 本人明白及同意在扣除上表所列之提取費用後(如適用),退保價值/保單戶口價值須減去有關
市場價值調整金額,該金額將以保誠收到此完全填妥表格及相關文件當日之百分比計算;本人並明白保誠行使市場價值調整將會調低
退保價值/保單戶口價值,從而反映有關保單旗下資產的變動。

要求生效日期:

生效日期。
Withdraw Cash Value of Policy Account (Cheque Amount) 提取保單戶口現金價值(支票金額)
USD/HKD 美元 /港元
Surrender 退保
Reason for Surrender (Please choose ONE appropriate answer) 申請退保原因(請選擇一個最適當的答案)
Change in Insurance needs 保險需求有所改變
Change in financial condition 財務狀況改變
Replaced by another insurance plan 以其他保險產品取代
Returns below expectations 保單回報未如理想
Coverage not comprehensive 保障不夠全面
Payment tenor is too long 付款期過長
Urgent need of Money 急需用錢
Lost confidence in the economy and future 對前景及經濟失去信心
Residing overseas 移居外地
Other Reason 其他理由
Unwilling to disclose reason 不願意披露理由
Part 2 第二部分 Payment Instruction 付款指示
1. All payments would be issued by cheque and in the name of the policyowner. For policy with collateral assignment, please state the payee of the cheque.
所有款項將以支票直接給予保單持有人。如保單已作抵押轉讓,請指示支票抬頭人。
2. If no payment option is selected, payment will be issued in HKD cheque. 如沒有選擇付款方式,款項會以港元支票簽發。
3. The cheque will be posted to the policyowner's correspondence address in Prudential's by registered mail, unless otherwise specify in the "Delivery Option"
below. 除在以下註明遞交方式,支票將會以掛號形式郵寄到保單持有人在保誠記錄上的通訊地址。
4. If the policyowner selects to collect the cheque at a branch of Standard Chartered Bank (Hong Kong) Limited (SCB) or at our Customer Service Centre(CSC),
please specify the SCB branch code, or the CSC location and policyowner's contact number. 如選擇到渣打銀行(香港)有限公司分行或本公司客戶
服務中心領取,請註明分行編號,或客戶服務中心地點及保單持有人聯絡號碼。

HKD Cheque 港元支票
(Applicable to USD / HKD Policy 適用於美元及港元保單)
Local USD Cheque 本地美元支票
(Applicable to USD Policy 適用於美元保單)
Overseas USD Cheque 海外美元支票
(Applicable to USD Policy 適用於美元保單)
For Policy with collateral assignee, please state the payee of the cheque 如保單已作抵押轉讓,請指示支票收款人

Collateral Assignee 抵押轉讓之承讓人

Posted to Policyowner's correspondence address in our record. 郵寄到保單持有人在本公司記錄上的通訊地址

results.title_name_en: Means of Premium Payment (For Macau branch)
results.title_name_tc: 付款形式 (適用於澳門分行)
results.content_en:
繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.
3 自動轉賬 Autopay^
閣下可以設立銀行戶口自動轉賬或更改
自動轉賬戶口繳費。請
● 聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
● 於 www.prudential.com.mo
(澳門>下載中心>更改保單付款
資料)下載的銀行戶口直接付款授權
書(澳門適用)
由於設立自動轉賬需時21天,請將授權
書及預繳保費的支票郵寄至本公司辦理
相關手續(地址:澳門郵政總局郵政信
箱3093號)。
You can set up a bank account autopay or change
autopay account to settle payment. Please
· contact your financial consultant or
· visit www.prudential.com.mo
(Macau > Download library > Update of
Policy Payment Details) for downloading
appropriate Bank Account Direct Debit
Authorization Form (for Macau).
As it takes 21 days to set up the direct debit
authorization, please send the form and the
cheque for advanced payment to us by mail for
processing (Address: P.O. Box 3093, General Post
Office, Macau).
$
電滙 Telegraphic Transfer
您可以使用電匯以保單貨幣 ** 匯款至 You may pay premium by telegraphic transfer
相應貨幣的銀行戶口繳交保費。請預 in policy currency ** to the bank account in
留至少七個工作天以處理有關款項。 the corresponding currency. Please allow
詳情請聯絡 閣下的理財顧問或前往 at least seven working days for processing
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt °
the premium payment. For details, please
contact your financial consultant or visit
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt-en.
?其他繳款辦法 Other Payment Instructions
請瀏覽 www.prudential.com.mo 以了解詳情。
Please visit www.prudential.com.mo for details.
親臨繳費處付款 Payment in person at cashier # ▲
閣下可攜同繳費通知書前往本公司之繳費 You can bring along the Premium Notice and
處以下列方法付款。
make payment at our cashier using one of the
following methods.
現金
每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為
120,000港元/123,700澳門元/15,000美元
或等值。為保障您的利益,繳付費用時,
您不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至您的理財顧
問。如您欲以現金繳費,建議親臨本公司
繳費處直接辦理。
Cash
Maximum HKD 120,000 / MOP 123,700 /
USD 15,000 or equivalent per payment
installment per policy. To protect your interest,
you should not pass cash or transfer funds
to your financial consultant when making
payment. If you prefer to pay in cash, you
should pay directly at our cashier.
劃線支票/銀行本票/匯票 **
只接受澳門本地銀行發出的港元*劃線支
票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保
誠保險有限公司」。如閣下於過去12個
月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)

hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)

runs.query: How to use the BOC cheque deposit machine to pay premium for my general insurance policy?

results.content_en:
Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited Payment Instructions 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法
To protect your interest, you are recommended to make the premium payment directly to us by using the following payment instructions. Prudential may change the premium payment
arrangement available anytime without prior notice. For enquiry, please contact your Financial Consultant or General Insurance Customer Service Hotline at (852) 3656 8362 or visit our
corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk.
為保障 閣下的利益,我們建議 閣下使用下列辦法直接繳付保費。保誠可能隨時更改可提供保費繳款安排而毋須事先通知。如有任何查詢,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或致電一
般保險客戶服務熱線(852) 3656 8362,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
Autopay by Credit Card or Bank Account 以信用卡或銀行户口自動轉賬
Should you need to set up autopay or change autopay account, please contact your Financial
Consultant or visit our corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk (Customer Support &
Self Service > Download Centre > Product Brochures eForm - General Insurance > General
Insurance Administration Forms) for downloading PRUchoice Series Payment Details
Amendment Form. Only applicable to PRUchoice "Personal Accident" / "Personal Accident
Plus" / "Medical" / "MediExtra".
Internet Banking 網上銀行 *
Your premium may be settled through internet banking bill payment services offered by
banks. Please contact your bank / Financial Consultant or visit our corporate website at
www.prudential.com.hk for further details.
FPS (if applicable) 使用「轉數快」繳款(如適用)
Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.
c. Scan the FPS QR code printed on the bill.
d. Check and ensure that the payment details including merchant name, bill number and
payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.
如需設立自動轉賬或更改自動轉賬戶口以繳付保費,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
於我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk(客戶及自助服務>下載中心 >產品小
冊子及表格–一般保險>一般保險行政表格)下載保誠精選系列一更改付款資料
申請表。只適用於保誠精選「安健寶」/「倍安寶」/「醫療寶」/「健康寶」。
閣下可選擇由銀行提供的「網上繳費服務」繳費。詳情請聯絡 閣下的銀行 /理
財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。
c. 掃描帳單上的「轉數快」二維碼繳款
d. 在確認付款前請小心核對繳交款項的資料,包括商户名稱、收款帳號和繳付
金。
PPS (Require a New Bill Registration by "Billing Number")繳費靈*(必須以「繳費編號」登記賬單)
PPS By Internet
Please visit www.ppshk.com
繳費靈網上服務
請瀏覽 www.ppshk.com
PPS By Phone
Please dial 18031 (English) or 18033 (Cantonese)
繳費靈電話服務
請致電 18031 (英語)或18033(粤語)
Our Merchant Code
6555
商戶編號
6555
Bill Type
01 (General Insurance)
02 (Group Medical)
賬單類別
01(一般保險)
02(團體醫療)
Bill Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy
Number is 9)
賬單號碼
請輸入 12 位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
ATM (JETCO) 銀通櫃員機*
Our Merchant Code
9228
Bill Type
11 (General Insurance Premium)
12 (Employee Benefit Premium)
Bill / Account Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy
Number is 9)
Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
Cash in 7-Eleven (if applicable) 到 7-11 便利店以現金支付(如適用)
You can make your payment by presenting Debit Note at any 7-Eleven Conveniences stores in
Hong Kong. Please present the QR code printed on the Debit Note for payment in cash. Please
retain the receipt for payment record.
Cheque Payment by Mail 郵寄支票 *
Please settle the premium and return this Debit Note with a cheque to us at: 28/F, One Island
East, 18 Westlands Road, Quarry Bay, Hong Kong.
Remarks: (1) Only accept HKD crossed cheque made payable to "Prudential General
Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write down the name of the Insured and the Policy
Number on the back of the cheque. (2) Only accept HKD cheque, cashier order or bank draft
which issued by Hong Kong banks. (3) Post-dated cheque is not accepted. (4) Please do not
send cash.
商戶編號
賬單類別
賬戶/客戶號碼
9228
11 (一般保險保費)
12(僱員福利保費)
請輸入12位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
閣下可攜同付款通知書,前往香港任何一間 7-Eleven 便利店,出示付款通知書上
的QR 碼以現金繳付保費。請保留收據作付款紀錄。
請繳付保費連同付款通知書及支票一併以郵遞方式寄往本公司,地址:香港鯽魚
涌華蘭路18 號港島東中心28樓。
注意事項:(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票
背面寫上保單投保人及保單號碼。(2)只接受本港銀行發出之港元支票、銀行本
票或匯票。(3)期票恕不獲接受。(4)請勿投寄現金。
Bank of China (BOC) Cheque Deposit Machine 中國銀行(香港)有限公司(「中銀香港」)「存支票機」*
You may make your payment by depositing crossed cheques in HKD issued by Hong Kong
banks to the BOC Cheque Deposit Machine. Please be reminded (1) Only accept crossed
cheque made payable to "Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write
down the name of the Insured, the Policy Number and contact number on the back of the
cheque. (2) Pay one item per policy with one cheque only. (3) Key in your 12-digit Billing
Number (The first digit of Policy Number is 9) at the Cheque Deposit Machine. (4) If the
cheque payment is not accurate, complete or followed as set out by our company, you may
potentially suffer from loss due to delayed or overdue payment.
閣下可於中銀香港「存支票機」存入由本港銀行發出之港元劃線支票。請注意:
(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票背面寫上保
單投保人姓名、保單編號及聯絡電話。(2)每張支票只限繳付一張保單的單項費

Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.

payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.

財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。

results.title_name_en: Means of Premium Payment (For Macau branch)
results.title_name_tc: 付款形式 (適用於澳門分行)
results.content_en:
繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.
3 自動轉賬 Autopay^
閣下可以設立銀行戶口自動轉賬或更改
自動轉賬戶口繳費。請
● 聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
● 於 www.prudential.com.mo
(澳門>下載中心>更改保單付款
資料)下載的銀行戶口直接付款授權
書(澳門適用)
由於設立自動轉賬需時21天,請將授權
書及預繳保費的支票郵寄至本公司辦理
相關手續(地址:澳門郵政總局郵政信
箱3093號)。
You can set up a bank account autopay or change
autopay account to settle payment. Please
· contact your financial consultant or
· visit www.prudential.com.mo
(Macau > Download library > Update of
Policy Payment Details) for downloading
appropriate Bank Account Direct Debit
Authorization Form (for Macau).
As it takes 21 days to set up the direct debit
authorization, please send the form and the
cheque for advanced payment to us by mail for
processing (Address: P.O. Box 3093, General Post
Office, Macau).
$
電滙 Telegraphic Transfer
您可以使用電匯以保單貨幣 ** 匯款至 You may pay premium by telegraphic transfer
相應貨幣的銀行戶口繳交保費。請預 in policy currency ** to the bank account in
留至少七個工作天以處理有關款項。 the corresponding currency. Please allow
詳情請聯絡 閣下的理財顧問或前往 at least seven working days for processing
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt °
the premium payment. For details, please
contact your financial consultant or visit
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt-en.
?其他繳款辦法 Other Payment Instructions
請瀏覽 www.prudential.com.mo 以了解詳情。
Please visit www.prudential.com.mo for details.
親臨繳費處付款 Payment in person at cashier # ▲
閣下可攜同繳費通知書前往本公司之繳費 You can bring along the Premium Notice and
處以下列方法付款。
make payment at our cashier using one of the
following methods.
現金
每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為
120,000港元/123,700澳門元/15,000美元
或等值。為保障您的利益,繳付費用時,
您不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至您的理財顧
問。如您欲以現金繳費,建議親臨本公司
繳費處直接辦理。
Cash
Maximum HKD 120,000 / MOP 123,700 /
USD 15,000 or equivalent per payment
installment per policy. To protect your interest,
you should not pass cash or transfer funds
to your financial consultant when making
payment. If you prefer to pay in cash, you
should pay directly at our cashier.
劃線支票/銀行本票/匯票 **
只接受澳門本地銀行發出的港元*劃線支
票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保
誠保險有限公司」。如閣下於過去12個
月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)

payment. If you prefer to pay in cash, you
should pay directly at our cashier.
劃線支票/銀行本票/匯票 **
只接受澳門本地銀行發出的港元*劃線支
票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保
誠保險有限公司」。如閣下於過去12個
月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)

results.content_en:
er and withdrawal of cash value within the first 5 policy years. 以下提取費用適用於首5個
保單年之退保及保單戶口現金價值提取:
● Within 1st year 第一年內 - 8%
● Within 2nd year 第二年內 - 6%
● Within 3rd year 第三年內 - 4%

Within 4th year 第四年內 - 2%

00000000
Prudential Hong Kong Limited 保誠保險有限公司
Part of Prudential plc (United Kingdom) 保誠集團成員
PDD/PAIPPW (06/25)
1/5
PAIPPW0401Part 1 第一部分 Policy Surrender / Withdrawal of Cash Value 退保/提取現金價值指示
I understand and consent that after deducting all other relevant redemption charges as listed above (if applicable), the surrender value / policy account value
will be reduced by the percentage of MVA based on the receipt date of this fully completed form with the required supporting documents by Prudential. I further
understand that the MVA, when applied, reduces the surrender value / policy account value to reflect the market value movement
of the underlying assets of the captioned policy. 本人明白及同意在扣除上表所列之提取費用後(如適用),退保價值/保單戶口價值須減去有關
市場價值調整金額,該金額將以保誠收到此完全填妥表格及相關文件當日之百分比計算;本人並明白保誠行使市場價值調整將會調低
退保價值/保單戶口價值,從而反映有關保單旗下資產的變動。
Requested Effective Date # :
要求生效日期:
Day 日
/
/
Month 月
Year年
# Leave this blank unless you have specific request on the effective date of
change. Prudential shall have the right to determine the effective date of
change upon acceptance of the Application. 如對更改生效日期沒有特別
要求,不用填寫此欄。於接受更改申請時,保誠有權決定更改之
生效日期。
Withdraw Cash Value of Policy Account (Cheque Amount) 提取保單戶口現金價值(支票金額)
USD/HKD 美元 /港元
Surrender 退保
Reason for Surrender (Please choose ONE appropriate answer) 申請退保原因(請選擇一個最適當的答案)
Change in Insurance needs 保險需求有所改變
Change in financial condition 財務狀況改變
Replaced by another insurance plan 以其他保險產品取代
Returns below expectations 保單回報未如理想
Coverage not comprehensive 保障不夠全面
Payment tenor is too long 付款期過長
Urgent need of Money 急需用錢
Lost confidence in the economy and future 對前景及經濟失去信心
Residing overseas 移居外地
Other Reason 其他理由
Unwilling to disclose reason 不願意披露理由
Part 2 第二部分 Payment Instruction 付款指示
1. All payments would be issued by cheque and in the name of the policyowner. For policy with collateral assignment, please state the payee of the cheque.
所有款項將以支票直接給予保單持有人。如保單已作抵押轉讓,請指示支票抬頭人。
2. If no payment option is selected, payment will be issued in HKD cheque. 如沒有選擇付款方式,款項會以港元支票簽發。
3. The cheque will be posted to the policyowner's correspondence address in Prudential's by registered mail, unless otherwise specify in the "Delivery Option"
below. 除在以下註明遞交方式,支票將會以掛號形式郵寄到保單持有人在保誠記錄上的通訊地址。
4. If the policyowner selects to collect the cheque at a branch of Standard Chartered Bank (Hong Kong) Limited (SCB) or at our Customer Service Centre(CSC),
please specify the SCB branch code, or the CSC location and policyowner's contact number. 如選擇到渣打銀行(香港)有限公司分行或本公司客戶
服務中心領取,請註明分行編號,或客戶服務中心地點及保單持有人聯絡號碼。
Payment Option 付款方式
HKD Cheque 港元支票
(Applicable to USD / HKD Policy 適用於美元及港元保單)
Local USD Cheque 本地美元支票
(Applicable to USD Policy 適用於美元保單)
Overseas USD Cheque 海外美元支票
(Applicable to USD Policy 適用於美元保單)
For Policy with collateral assignee, please state the payee of the cheque 如保單已作抵押轉讓,請指示支票收款人

Collateral Assignee 抵押轉讓之承讓人

Posted to Policyowner's correspondence address in our record. 郵寄到保單持有人在本公司記錄上的通訊地址

PAIUWH1512Part 5 第五部分 Declaration and Authorization (Continued)聲明及授權(績)
本人/吾等,受保人/保單持有人,授權以下各項(1)任何醫生、醫院、診所、保險公司、僱主、機構或人士,將已經或其後存錄的有關
本人/吾等之醫療病歷、紀錄或其他資料披露予保誠保險有限公司,作為評估及處理此保單更改或復效申請及索償及提供其後服務之用。
為免任何疑問,本授權書對本人/吾等之繼承人、承讓人、遺囑執行人及遺產管理人均具有約束力。即使本人/吾等死亡或無行為能力
(包括但不限於精神上無行為能力),本授權書仍具效力。本授權書之副本將被視為與正本具同樣效力;(2)貴公司或任何由貴公司指定
之醫生、醫務人員或化驗所,可就此保單更改或復效申請或任何有關索償申請替本人/吾等進行所有所需之醫療評估及測試,以審核本人
/吾等之健康狀況。
只適用於「自願醫保」計劃
本人/吾等,作為受保人/保單持有人,在此聲明並同意:(1)保誠保險有限公司(「貴公司」)並未正式接納保單更改或復效,且於有
關批註 (「批註」)發出予本人/吾等前,任何保單更改或復效將不會生效;(2)此問卷收集與健康相關的資料僅作為核保之用途,而核
保是貴公司評估申請人之健康風險及決定申請結果的程序。貴公司採用的核保程序應為公平合理,並會因應本人/吾等要求解釋批註申請
結果;(3)作為申請人,本人/吾等需要盡其所知所信,按本問卷中要求向貴公司提供完整及準確的資料。貴公司根據本人/吾等提供的資
料,可能會提出跟進問題或查詢而需要本人/吾等進一步提供資料以作核保之用,而已提供之資料完全屬實並將會是合約的依據;(4)若
本人/吾等在提交本批註申請書後至本人/吾等收到批註前的期間就本問卷中提供的資料有任何改變或更新,本人/吾等需要及早通知貴公
司;(5)即使已成功獲簽發批註,若本人/吾等未按(3)所述盡其所知所信向貴公司提供完整及準確的資料,或未按(4)所述就資料的任何
改變或更新而及早通知貴公司,本人/吾等的保險保障可能會受到影響,貴公司亦可能因此終止、作廢或撤銷有關批註及/或保單,或拒
絕賠償;(6)假如對事實或資料的重要性產生疑問時,必須在本申請書上向貴公司披露該事實或資料。
只適用於「自願醫保」以外計劃(不論基本計劃或附加保障)
本人/吾等,受保人/保單持有人,在此聲明並同意(1)保誠保險有限公司(「貴公司」)未正式接納保單更改或復效及發出有關批註
(「批註」)予本人/吾等前,任何保單更改或復效將不會生效;(2)本人/吾等沒有保留任何重要的事實或資料,而已提供之事實及資
料完全屬實,並將會是合約的依據;(3)假如本人/吾等未披露之事實或資料內容,足以影響貴公司衡量及應否接受保單更改或復效的申
請,可令批註及/或合約失效;(4)在本人/吾等簽署本申請書後直至本人/吾等收到批註前,本人/吾等必須向貴公司披露有關受保人及
購買投保人保障系列的投保人的健康狀況或可保權益的任何改變;(5)假如對事實或資料的重要性產生疑問時,必須在本申請書上向貴公
司披露該事實或資料。
Part 6 第六部分 Collection of Levy by the Insurance Authority ("IA")保險業監管局(「保監局」)收取的徵費
From 1 January 2018 onwards, a levy on insurance premiums for insurance policies will be payable to IA by policyowner. IA will collect the levy from policyowner
through insurance companies. If you do not pay the overdue levy timely, the Insurance Authority ("IA") may, according to the law, impose on the policyholder a
penalty of up to HK$5,000, and may recover the outstanding levy as a civil debt due to the IA. Levy must be paid when the premium is paid.
In this connection, notwithstanding anything contained in this form, policy provision or any other agreements between us, you agree us with the following
assistance as may be necessary to enable us to collect any outstanding levy payable to IA in respect of the policy applied under this application form to the
extent applicable and relevant, subject to the terms hereof: -
(a) you authorize us to deduct the levy from Premium Deposit Account ("PDA") of the policy; and
(b) you authorize us to deduct the levy by Automatic Premium Loan ("APL") if any renewal premium of the policy is being paid by APL and such levy shall be part
of APL on which interest shall be charged in accordance with the policy provisions; and
(c) you agree the prepayment of levy on prepaid premiums if you pre-pay any premium; and
(d) in case the payment you pay to us is insufficient to pay for both premium and levy, you authorize us to settle the premium first; and
(e) in case the payment you pay to us is to settle outstanding levy, you authorize us to first settle the oldest outstanding levy.
由2018年1月1日起,保單持有人必須向保監局繳付保單之保費徵費。保監局將透過保險公司向保單持有人收取徵費。若 閣下未能依時
清繳過期徵費,保險業監管局(「保監局」)可根據法例向其施加最高港幣$5,000的罰款,亦可循民事程序追討欠付的徵費。徵費需於
繳交保費時同時繳交。
有見及此,儘管載於本表格、保單條款或我們之間其他任何協議所包含的任何內容,閣下同意我們在需要時提供以下協助,使我們能夠
就閣下透過此人壽保險申請書申請之保單適當地及相關地根據以下條款,收取任何應向保監局繳付之未繳徵費:
(a) 閣下授權我們從保單保費儲蓄戶口扣除所需的徵費;及
(b) 閣下授權我們可於保單之任何續期保費以自動保費貸款形式扣除時,同時以自動保費貸款形式扣除徵費,該扣除之徵費將成為自動
保費貸款的一部份並將按保單條款計算利息;及
(c)
閣下同意如預繳任何保費,將同時就預繳保費預付徵費;及
(d)
如閣下所繳付的金額不足以扣除保費及徵費,閣下同意我們先扣除保費;及
(e)
如閣下所繳付的金額是用作繳付逾期徵費,閣下授權我們先扣除最前期的逾期徵費。
00000000

請,可令批註及/或合約失效;(4)在本人/吾等簽署本申請書後直至本人/吾等收到批註前,本人/吾等必須向貴公司披露有關受保人及
購買投保人保障系列的投保人的健康狀況或可保權益的任何改變;(5)假如對事實或資料的重要性產生疑問時,必須在本申請書上向貴公
司披露該事實或資料。
Part 6 第六部分 Collection of Levy by the Insurance Authority ("IA")保險業監管局(「保監局」)收取的徵費
From 1 January 2018 onwards, a levy on insurance premiums for insurance policies will be payable to IA by policyowner. IA will collect the levy from policyowner
through insurance companies. If you do not pay the overdue levy timely, the Insurance Authority ("IA") may, according to the law, impose on the policyholder a
penalty of up to HK$5,000, and may recover the outstanding levy as a civil debt due to the IA. Levy must be paid when the premium is paid.
In this connection, notwithstanding anything contained in this form, policy provision or any other agreements between us, you agree us with the following
assistance as may be necessary to enable us to collect any outstanding levy payable to IA in respect of the policy applied under this application form to the
extent applicable and relevant, subject to the terms hereof: -
(a) you authorize us to deduct the levy from Premium Deposit Account ("PDA") of the policy; and
(b) you authorize us to deduct the levy by Automatic Premium Loan ("APL") if any renewal premium of the policy is being paid by APL and such levy shall be part
of APL on which interest shall be charged in accordance with the policy provisions; and
(c) you agree the prepayment of levy on prepaid premiums if you pre-pay any premium; and
(d) in case the payment you pay to us is insufficient to pay for both premium and levy, you authorize us to settle the premium first; and
(e) in case the payment you pay to us is to settle outstanding levy, you authorize us to first settle the oldest outstanding levy.
由2018年1月1日起,保單持有人必須向保監局繳付保單之保費徵費。保監局將透過保險公司向保單持有人收取徵費。若 閣下未能依時
清繳過期徵費,保險業監管局(「保監局」)可根據法例向其施加最高港幣$5,000的罰款,亦可循民事程序追討欠付的徵費。徵費需於
繳交保費時同時繳交。
有見及此,儘管載於本表格、保單條款或我們之間其他任何協議所包含的任何內容,閣下同意我們在需要時提供以下協助,使我們能夠
就閣下透過此人壽保險申請書申請之保單適當地及相關地根據以下條款,收取任何應向保監局繳付之未繳徵費:
(a) 閣下授權我們從保單保費儲蓄戶口扣除所需的徵費;及
(b) 閣下授權我們可於保單之任何續期保費以自動保費貸款形式扣除時,同時以自動保費貸款形式扣除徵費,該扣除之徵費將成為自動
保費貸款的一部份並將按保單條款計算利息;及
(c)
閣下同意如預繳任何保費,將同時就預繳保費預付徵費;及
(d)
如閣下所繳付的金額不足以扣除保費及徵費,閣下同意我們先扣除保費;及
(e)
如閣下所繳付的金額是用作繳付逾期徵費,閣下授權我們先扣除最前期的逾期徵費。

本人/吾等之醫療病歷、紀錄或其他資料披露予保誠保險有限公司,作為評估及處理此保單更改或復效申請及索償及提供其後服務之用。
為免任何疑問,本授權書對本人/吾等之繼承人、承讓人、遺囑執行人及遺產管理人均具有約束力。即使本人/吾等死亡或無行為能力
(包括但不限於精神上無行為能力),本授權書仍具效力。本授權書之副本將被視為與正本具同樣效力;(2)貴公司或任何由貴公司指定
之醫生、醫務人員或化驗所,可就此保單更改或復效申請或任何有關索償申請替本人/吾等進行所有所需之醫療評估及測試,以審核本人
/吾等之健康狀況。

關批註 (「批註」)發出予本人/吾等前,任何保單更改或復效將不會生效;(2)此問卷收集與健康相關的資料僅作為核保之用途,而核
保是貴公司評估申請人之健康風險及決定申請結果的程序。貴公司採用的核保程序應為公平合理,並會因應本人/吾等要求解釋批註申請
結果;(3)作為申請人,本人/吾等需要盡其所知所信,按本問卷中要求向貴公司提供完整及準確的資料。貴公司根據本人/吾等提供的資
料,可能會提出跟進問題或查詢而需要本人/吾等進一步提供資料以作核保之用,而已提供之資料完全屬實並將會是合約的依據;(4)若

改變或更新而及早通知貴公司,本人/吾等的保險保障可能會受到影響,貴公司亦可能因此終止、作廢或撤銷有關批註及/或保單,或拒

runs.query: How to use the BOC cheque deposit machine to pay premium for my general insurance policy?

results.content_en:
Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited Payment Instructions 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法
To protect your interest, you are recommended to make the premium payment directly to us by using the following payment instructions. Prudential may change the premium payment
arrangement available anytime without prior notice. For enquiry, please contact your Financial Consultant or General Insurance Customer Service Hotline at (852) 3656 8362 or visit our
corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk.
為保障 閣下的利益,我們建議 閣下使用下列辦法直接繳付保費。保誠可能隨時更改可提供保費繳款安排而毋須事先通知。如有任何查詢,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或致電一
般保險客戶服務熱線(852) 3656 8362,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
Autopay by Credit Card or Bank Account 以信用卡或銀行户口自動轉賬
Should you need to set up autopay or change autopay account, please contact your Financial
Consultant or visit our corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk (Customer Support &
Self Service > Download Centre > Product Brochures eForm - General Insurance > General
Insurance Administration Forms) for downloading PRUchoice Series Payment Details
Amendment Form. Only applicable to PRUchoice "Personal Accident" / "Personal Accident
Plus" / "Medical" / "MediExtra".
Internet Banking 網上銀行 *
Your premium may be settled through internet banking bill payment services offered by
banks. Please contact your bank / Financial Consultant or visit our corporate website at
www.prudential.com.hk for further details.
FPS (if applicable) 使用「轉數快」繳款(如適用)
Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.
c. Scan the FPS QR code printed on the bill.
d. Check and ensure that the payment details including merchant name, bill number and
payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.
如需設立自動轉賬或更改自動轉賬戶口以繳付保費,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
於我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk(客戶及自助服務>下載中心 >產品小
冊子及表格–一般保險>一般保險行政表格)下載保誠精選系列一更改付款資料
申請表。只適用於保誠精選「安健寶」/「倍安寶」/「醫療寶」/「健康寶」。
閣下可選擇由銀行提供的「網上繳費服務」繳費。詳情請聯絡 閣下的銀行 /理
財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。
c. 掃描帳單上的「轉數快」二維碼繳款
d. 在確認付款前請小心核對繳交款項的資料,包括商户名稱、收款帳號和繳付
金。
PPS (Require a New Bill Registration by "Billing Number")繳費靈*(必須以「繳費編號」登記賬單)
PPS By Internet
Please visit www.ppshk.com
繳費靈網上服務
請瀏覽 www.ppshk.com
PPS By Phone
Please dial 18031 (English) or 18033 (Cantonese)
繳費靈電話服務
請致電 18031 (英語)或18033(粤語)
Our Merchant Code
6555
商戶編號
6555
Bill Type
01 (General Insurance)
02 (Group Medical)
賬單類別
01(一般保險)
02(團體醫療)
Bill Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy

Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited Payment Instructions 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法
To protect your interest, you are recommended to make the premium payment directly to us by using the following payment instructions. Prudential may change the premium payment
arrangement available anytime without prior notice. For enquiry, please contact your Financial Consultant or General Insurance Customer Service Hotline at (852) 3656 8362 or visit our
corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk.
為保障 閣下的利益,我們建議 閣下使用下列辦法直接繳付保費。保誠可能隨時更改可提供保費繳款安排而毋須事先通知。如有任何查詢,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或致電一
般保險客戶服務熱線(852) 3656 8362,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
Autopay by Credit Card or Bank Account 以信用卡或銀行户口自動轉賬
Should you need to set up autopay or change autopay account, please contact your Financial
Consultant or visit our corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk (Customer Support &
Self Service > Download Centre > Product Brochures eForm - General Insurance > General
Insurance Administration Forms) for downloading PRUchoice Series Payment Details
Amendment Form. Only applicable to PRUchoice "Personal Accident" / "Personal Accident
Plus" / "Medical" / "MediExtra".
Internet Banking 網上銀行 *
Your premium may be settled through internet banking bill payment services offered by
banks. Please contact your bank / Financial Consultant or visit our corporate website at
www.prudential.com.hk for further details.
FPS (if applicable) 使用「轉數快」繳款(如適用)
Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.
c. Scan the FPS QR code printed on the bill.
d. Check and ensure that the payment details including merchant name, bill number and
payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.
如需設立自動轉賬或更改自動轉賬戶口以繳付保費,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
於我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk(客戶及自助服務>下載中心 >產品小
冊子及表格–一般保險>一般保險行政表格)下載保誠精選系列一更改付款資料
申請表。只適用於保誠精選「安健寶」/「倍安寶」/「醫療寶」/「健康寶」。
閣下可選擇由銀行提供的「網上繳費服務」繳費。詳情請聯絡 閣下的銀行 /理
財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。
c. 掃描帳單上的「轉數快」二維碼繳款
d. 在確認付款前請小心核對繳交款項的資料,包括商户名稱、收款帳號和繳付
金。

results.content_en:
or not to be done or to be complied with by the
Insured and
b) the truth of the statements and answers in the Proposal and Declaration and
the Estimated Earnings Declaration and the Actual Earnings Declaration
shall be conditions precedent to any liability of the Company to make payment or
to provide indemnity under this Policy.
2
IMPORTANT - the Insured is requesed to read this Policy. If any error or mis-description be found, the Policy should be returned to the issuing Office for correction.The Company will also in the event of the death of the Insured indemnify the
Insured's legal personal representatives in the Terms of this Policy in respect of
liability incurred by the Insured provided that such legal personal representatives
shall as though they were the Insured observe fulfill and be subject to the Terms of
this Policy in as far as they can apply.
If the Company is obliged by the Ordinance to pay an amount for which the
Company would not otherwise be liable under this Policy the Insured shall forthwith
repay such amount to the Company.
Policy Limit of Indemnity
(a) In respect of any Accident or Disease giving rise to a claims against the
Insured for which indemnity is provided under this Policy the Company's
indemnity to the Insured including costs and expenses incurred by or on
behalf of the Insured with the Company's written consent shall in the
aggregate be limited to the amount specified in the Schedule as "Policy Limit
of Indemnity" irrespective of the number of Employees who may sustain
bodily injury or death consequent on or attributable to the same occurrence
of Accident or Disease.
(b) In relation to any liability of the Insured in respect of a Disease contracted
by an Employee due to the nature of his/ her employment with the Insured
which nature of employment applies during a period that extends over more
than one policy Period of Insurance
(i)
the aggregate of the Company's indemnity to the insured under all
insurance policies including costs and expenses incurred by or on behalf
of the Insured shall not exceed the limit of indemnity of the insurance
policy that was in force at the time the nature of the employee's
employment to which such Disease was due first affected the Employee
and
(ii)
subject to limitation of paragraph b) (i) hereof the Company's indemnity
to the Insured under this Policy including costs and expenses incurred
by or on behalf of the Insured shall be limited to such proportion of
the Insured's liability in respect of such Disease as that part of the
Employee's period of employment filling within the Period of Insurance
of this Policy bears to the total period of his/ her employment to the
nature of which such Disease was due.
(c)
If the occurrence of any Accident or Disease results in indemnity hereunder
to more than one Insured the limitations of the Company's liability specified
in paragraphs (a) and (b) hereof shall apply to the aggregate of indemnity to
all Insureds.
(d) At any time after the occurrence of any Accident of Disease giving rise to a
claim or claims against the Insured for which indemnity is provide under this
Policy the company may pay to the Insured the full amount of the company's
liability specified in paragraph (a) or (b) hereof (after the deduction of any
sums already paid) or any lesser amount for which such claim or claims
can be settled and shall relinquish the conduct of any defence settlement
or proceedings relating to such claim or claims and shall not thereafter be
responsible for any compensation damages or costs in respect thereof or for
any costs or expenses whatsoever incurred by the Insured after the company
shall have relinquished such conduct or for any loss damage or expenses
caused to the Insured in consequence of any act or omission of the company
in connection therewith or of the company relinquishing such conduct.
(e)
If there should be any shortfall in the actual Earning declared in accordance
with paragraph (b) of INSURANCE PERMIUM of this Policy from the
respective actual Earnings, the extent of the Company's Indemnity shall be
reduced proportionately by the extant of under-insurance; and the balance
shall be borne by the Insured himself. If no declaration of the actual Earnings
by the Insured is received by the company as prescribed, for the purpose of
this clause the Earnings that should have been declared to determine the
extent of the under-insurance if any.
Insurance Premium
(a)
Prior to the commencement of the Period of Insurance the Insured shall
supply the Company with a declaration estimating the Earnings of the
Employees employed in the Business during the Period of Insurance (which
declaration is referred to herein as "the Estimated Earnings Declaration") on
the basis of which a deposit premium becomes payable to the Company.
(b) The Insured shall within ninety (90) days after the expiry of the Period of
Insurance or upon cancellation of the Policy supply the company with a
completed Premium Adjustment and Declaration of Earnings Form stating
the Earnings of Employees an provide the relevant supporting documents
during the Period of Insurance (which declaration is referred to herein as
"the Actual Earnings Declaration"). If the actual Earnings shall differ from
the estimated Earnings the difference in premium shall be met by a further
proportionate adjustment premium to be paid to the company or by a
premium refund to the Insured as the case may be.
(c)
It is hereby declared that the premium payable by the Insured in consideration
of the indemnity provide under this Policy is the sum of the deposit premium
and the adjustment premium calculated pursuant to the paragraphs (a) and
(b) hereof.
(d)
The name Hong Kong Identity Card number class of employment and
Earnings of every Employee of the Insured employed in the Business from
time to time during the Period of Insurance shall be properly recorded by the
Insured and retained in a safe place so that a record exists of all persons who
are Employees of the Insured for the purposes of this Policy and the Insured
shall at all reasonable time allow the Company to inspect and obtain copies
of such records.
(e)
If the Insured fails to cooperate with the company in submitting the
completed Premium Adjustment and Declaration of Earnings Form, without
prejudice to any other rights of the company, the company shall retain the
discretion not to renew this insurance upon expiry of the Policy.
Terrorism Endorsement
Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary in this Policy or any endorsement
thereto it is hereby agreed that in respect of any bodily injury or death by accident
or disease("the Loss") directly or indirectly caused by resulting from or in connection
with any act of terrorism or any action taken in controlling preventing suppressing
or in any way relating to any act terrorism regardless of any other cause or event
contributing concurrently or in any other sequence to the loss.
(a) The Policy Limit of indemnity shall be such amount which the Company
actually receives from the Government of the Hong Kong Special
Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China("the Government")
pursuant to an Agreement for Provision of Facility date 11th January 2002
between the Government and the Company under which the Government
agreed to make available to the Company and other direct insurance
companies authorized to underwrite employees' compensation insurance
business in Hong Kong a facility to enable them to meet claims under
employees' compensation insurance policies in respect of death and injury
arising out of an event of terrorism ("the Facility Agreement")
(b)
the Company will only be required to make payment after it has received
from the Government i) an approval letter confirming that the Company
should settle the claim and in) payment under the Facility Agreement and
(c)
for the avoidance of doubt the Company shall have no obligation to
make payment if for whatever reason it does not receive payment from
the Government under the Faculty Agreement whether or not due to the
Government's contention that the Loss does not fail within the scope of the
Facility Agreement or the Company's breach of the Facility Agreement.
For the purpose of the above an act of terrorism means the use of force or violence
or other means or the threat thereof of any person or persons whether acting alone
or on behalf of or in connection with any organization or government for political
religious or ideological purpose with an intention to influence any government and/
or to put the public or any section of the public in fear.
If the Company alleges that the Loss falls within the scope of the Policy the burden
of proving the contrary shall be upon the Insured. In the event any part of this
Policy is found to be invalid or unenforceable the remainder shall remain the full
force and effect.
EXCEPTIONS TO SECTION I (including its Extensions)
1)
The Company will not pay for loss or damage caused by or contributed to or in
connection with
i)
wear and tear depreciation moths vermin inserts damp mildew rust
rot corrosion the action of light or atmosphere or gradually operating
causes.
ii)
change in temperature or humidity or failure or inadequate operation or
any variation in temperature od an air-conditioning cooling or heating
system.
iii)
misuse or use contrary to manufacturer's instructions of shop appliance
and equipment inherent defect or faulty design in materials plan or
specification,
iv)
denting chipping scratching or breakage of glass unless caused by fire
or explosion or burglars or covered under the Fixed Glass Extension of
Section I.
v)
any dishonest acts or theft or fraud of the Insured or the Insured's
partners directors or Employees.
vi)
electrical or mechanical breakdown failure or derangement.
vii)
any process of cleaning repairing renovating dyeing erecting or
dismantling.
viii)
any shoplifting mysterious disappearance or shortage if only revealed by
stocktaking or making of an inventory.
ix)
any shortage arising from deliberate act or omission of the Insured or
the Insured's partners directors or Employees.
x)
confiscation or detention by Customs or Government officials.
xi)
loss of market.
xii)
theft of Sample and Trade Stocks under Sub-Section B unless
accompanied by violence or threat of violence to persons or forcible and
violent entry into or exit from the Shop Premise.
xiii) work of art not supported by sales receipt or valuation certificate issued
by a competent unless with a written consent of the Company.
2)
Excepted as provided for in terms of this Policy the Company shall not
be liable for loss of Money securities and other negotiable instruments
IMPORTANT - the Insured is requesed to read this Policy. If any error or mis-description be found, the Policy should be returned to the issuing Office for correction.

business in Hong Kong a facility to enable them to meet claims under
employees' compensation insurance policies in respect of death and injury
arising out of an event of terrorism ("the Facility Agreement")
(b)
the Company will only be required to make payment after it has received
from the Government i) an approval letter confirming that the Company
should settle the claim and in) payment under the Facility Agreement and
(c)
for the avoidance of doubt the Company shall have no obligation to
make payment if for whatever reason it does not receive payment from
the Government under the Faculty Agreement whether or not due to the
Government's contention that the Loss does not fail within the scope of the
Facility Agreement or the Company's breach of the Facility Agreement.
For the purpose of the above an act of terrorism means the use of force or violence
or other means or the threat thereof of any person or persons whether acting alone
or on behalf of or in connection with any organization or government for political
religious or ideological purpose with an intention to influence any government and/
or to put the public or any section of the public in fear.
If the Company alleges that the Loss falls within the scope of the Policy the burden
of proving the contrary shall be upon the Insured. In the event any part of this
Policy is found to be invalid or unenforceable the remainder shall remain the full
force and effect.
EXCEPTIONS TO SECTION I (including its Extensions)
1)
The Company will not pay for loss or damage caused by or contributed to or in
connection with
i)
wear and tear depreciation moths vermin inserts damp mildew rust
rot corrosion the action of light or atmosphere or gradually operating
causes.
ii)
change in temperature or humidity or failure or inadequate operation or
any variation in temperature od an air-conditioning cooling or heating
system.
iii)
misuse or use contrary to manufacturer's instructions of shop appliance
and equipment inherent defect or faulty design in materials plan or
specification,
iv)
denting chipping scratching or breakage of glass unless caused by fire
or explosion or burglars or covered under the Fixed Glass Extension of
Section I.
v)
any dishonest acts or theft or fraud of the Insured or the Insured's
partners directors or Employees.
vi)
electrical or mechanical breakdown failure or derangement.
vii)
any process of cleaning repairing renovating dyeing erecting or
dismantling.
viii)
any shoplifting mysterious disappearance or shortage if only revealed by
stocktaking or making of an inventory.
ix)
any shortage arising from deliberate act or omission of the Insured or
the Insured's partners directors or Employees.
x)
confiscation or detention by Customs or Government officials.
xi)
loss of market.
xii)
theft of Sample and Trade Stocks under Sub-Section B unless
accompanied by violence or threat of violence to persons or forcible and
violent entry into or exit from the Shop Premise.
xiii) work of art not supported by sales receipt or valuation certificate issued
by a competent unless with a written consent of the Company.
2)
Excepted as provided for in terms of this Policy the Company shall not
be liable for loss of Money securities and other negotiable instruments
IMPORTANT - the Insured is requesed to read this Policy. If any error or mis-description be found, the Policy should be returned to the issuing Office for correction.

I/ We hereby declare and agree that 本人/吾等現在聲明及明白:

the contract with Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited.
就本人/吾等知悉範園內,此申請表上填報的一切資料,均屬確實完整,本人/吾等並同意以此申請表作為本人/吾等與保誠財險有限公司之間所訂合約的根據。
2. The Insurance will not be in force until the application form has been accepted by Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited and the premium has been paid, except to the
extend of any official cover note which may be issued.
除持有保誠財險有限公司簽發的臨時保單外,保單需經保誠財險有限公司覆核、接納申請表及已繳付保費才能生效。

本人/吾等已細閱及清楚明白有關小冊子內容,及有權要求索取保單樣本了解有關保障詳細範圍。
4. Any person to be covered under this Insurance is a permanent resident of Hong Kong SAR.
此保單所有將受保障的人士均為香港特別行政區永久性居民。
5. Please make sure the mobile number and email address of the applicant are correct. Once the Policy is issued, the policy number will be sent to the applicant via SMS. And, system
will send Account Activation Code to the same mobile number during the registration of myPrudential. For environmental protection, Prudential will not mail this Policy/
endorsement and the subsequent policy renewal documents to the applicant; the corresponding eDocument will be stored in applicant's myPrudential account for their reference,
and the applicant can print out the document if necessary. Whenever a notification email is sent to the applicant's designated email address, the applicant is deemed to have
received the corresponding new eDocument. If the applicant has not registered myPrudential yet, please do so as soon as possible from our company website.
請確保申請人的手提電話號碼及電郵地址是正確的。保單繕發後,申請人會透過手機短訊收到保單號碼;另外,登記myPrudential時,系統亦會向此手提電話號碼
發送戶口啟動碼。為保護環境,保誠將不會郵寄此保單/批單及往後之續保文件予申請人;有關之電子文件將儲存於申請人的myPrudential戶口之內供申請人下載
細閱。申請人有需要時亦可自行列印保單文件。每當提示電郵已經發送到申請人指定的電郵地址,申請人將被視為已收有關的最新電子文件。如申請人仍未登記
myPrudential,敬請瀏覽本公司網站從速辦理。
6. Levy collected by the Insurance Authority (if any) has been imposed on this Policy at the application rate and would be remitted in accordance with the prescribed arrangements.
For further information, please visit http://www.prudential.com.hk/levy or www.ia.org.hk/tc/levy. If you do not pay the overdue levy timely, the Insurance Authority ("IA") may,
according to the law, impose on the policyholder a penalty and may recover the outstanding levy as a civil debt due to the IA.
保險業監管局(「保監局」)已按適用費率對此保單徵收徵費,有關徵費將按照訂明安排匯付。如需更多資訊,請瀏覽 http://www.prudential.com.hk/levy 或
www.ia.org.hk/tc/levy。若閣下未能依時清繳過期徵費,保險業監管局(「保監局」)可根據法例向其施加罰款,亦可循民事程序追討欠付的徵費。

The Applicants warrant that the person(s) to be covered is/ are not travelling contrary to the advice of a Medical Practitioner, or for the purpose of obtaining medical treatment.
申請人士/機構保證所有將受保障的人士其旅程絕無違反醫生勸喻,亦非以治療為目的。
